short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skip the blog and get straight to the recipe

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A (very) basic extension that finds recipe blocks in html and jumps your scroll position down to it. This is useful for blog-style recipes that you want to skip through to get to the physical recipe part.
